item.title: Writing to Delta Lake from Spark with Scala
item.description: Goal Process JSON operations (create/update) and write the final snapshot to Delta Lake on Azure Data Lake Storage. Dependencies ThisBuild / version := "0.1.0" ThisBuild / scalaVersion := "2.13.8" ThisBuild / organization := "bkr" libraryDependencies ++= List("org.apache.spark" %% "spark-core" % "3.2.0", "org.apache.spark" %% "spark-sql" % "3.2.0", "org.apache.spark" %% "spark-sql-kafka-0-10" % "3.2.0", "org.apache.spark" %% "spark-avro" % "3.2.0") libraryDependencies ++= List("org.apache.hadoop" % "hadoop-common" % "3.3.1", "org.apache.hadoop" % "hadoop-azure" % "3.3.1") libraryDependencies += "org.
